title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 609.2 - Standards of payment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 609.2 - Standards of payment

State Regulations

Reimbursable costs must not exceed rates established by
the department or imposed upon the department by State or Federal laws or
regulations and must be in accordance with the limitations set forth in section
600.3
(c) of this

Title. Unless specifically permitted by the department, costs must not exceed
rates ordinarily available to other persons or entities and will represent the
lowest available rates. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
609.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
